text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Eccentric as her methods are, T.M.<n>Opera's dedication to
her dream is<n>truer than any.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not easy to find that kind of<n>motivation, so I decide to
have another<n>talk with her about training. As I'm<n>scouring
the school to find her...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, you glorious sun! Let us shine our<n>light upon the world!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She strives to gain the sun-like light of<n>the Overlord,
believing her conviction<n>will carry her forward.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My brilliance shines bright as ever!<n>Hahahaha! Haaah ha ha
ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And with that, she turns and runs off<n>to continue her
theatrics elsewhere.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I can't help but notice the energy ineach of her steps. Thinking back, hertraining was more impressivethan I gave her credit for...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah! I dance as beautifully as a swan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without perfectly balanced form, she<n>could never have kept
up those nimble<n>dance moves.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hark! What dances through the skies<n>with the grace of a
swallow? 'Tis I!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even her diving at the pool required a<n>strong mental
fortitude.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: May my beauty fill the whole world<n>with happiness!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And her power and speed climbing<n>those stairs to the shrine
were a true<n>testament to her abilities.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She isn't just saying she wants to<n>be Overlord. She wants
all the skill and<n>ability that the title requires.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Maybe... she really is on thetrack to glory.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I had the strangest sensation that<n>someone called my name.
Must've<n>been a fancy of my imagination...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's too far away to notice my futile<n>attempts to call her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Then I'll just have to get really loud...<n>I'll call her in a voice
suitable to<n>summoning the Overlord!
choice_data_list: Haha... Haaaah ha ha ha HAH!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: That voice!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What fortune is this?! If it isn't my<n>former provisional
trainer!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That laugh just now was as<n>magisterial as a true Overlord...
What<n>brought about this change in you?
choice_data_list:
I want to become a trainer magisterial enough
to work with you.

I want to become a trainer magisterial enough
to work with you.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Did you hear that, world?! This fine<n>trainer wishes to work
with me once<n>again!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Such a majestic bellow of laughter<n>was for me?! Of course
it was... Hehe,<n>hahaha!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha ha ha hah! What fun<n>this is turning out to
be, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But be not mistaken! For us to<n>become a real team, we
must share in<n>the same aspirations.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
So I would hear it from your lips! Tell<n>me true, what is the
absolute meaning<n>in "Overlord" that I seek?
choice_data_list:
To seize your dream, through overwhelming
victory!

To seize your dream, through overwhelming
victory!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah... Superb! Most<n>excellent—positively perfect, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The overwhelming power of the<n>Overlord imparts bravery to
the<n>masses! The Overlord becomes the<n>hope that people
live for!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That is precisely why I will settle for<n>no mere first-place
win—I will obtain<n>absolute victory and become the<n>
Centurial Overlord!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Have you steeled your heart to<n>combine forces and achieve<n>
immortality?!
choice_data_list:
Making you Centurial Overlord will be my life's
mission!

Making you Centurial Overlord will be my life's
mission!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha ha ha hah! Well said,<n>Trainer! A new legend
begins on this<n>day!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Though, such a stupendous event<n>must be fittingly
celebrated. How best<n>to cement this in history... I know!<n>
Let's take a selfie!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
You together with me, the<n>Overlord—this "usie" shall be
glorious.<n>Now let your joy shine forth!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later, Opera O sends me the pictures<n>we took that day,
which are mostly of<n>her alone...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless... With that, the curtains<n>rose over our regal
road to victory.
